name: Greek Turkey Burgers
description: Take your burger game next level with the Greek salad-topped burger. All those juicy Mediterranean flavours and fresh veg. The variety of veggies in the salad delivers a buffet of health benefits. Antioxidant-rich ingredients like tomatoes and peppers help protect cells from damage and inflammation.

ingredients.name: Chicken Souvlaki Seasoning or Donair Seasoning

preparation:
1. In a large bowl, mix turkey and seasoning. Form into four equal burger patties. 
  2. Heat oil in Sauté Pan over medium heat. Add patties and cook for 4–5 min per side, or until cooked through.
  3. Meanwhile, chop the tomato, shallot, bell pepper, and cucumber into large chunks and place in a food processor. Pulse the vegetables a few times until they are combined and cut into smaller chunks.  Be careful not to blend too much—you still want some chunks in your salsa.
  4. Split buns and toast, if desired. Spread buns with mayo and place lettuce on bottom buns. Divide burgers, salsa, feta, and additional toppings (if using) between bottom buns. Add top bun to each fully dressed bottom bun.
tips: Swap out seasoning for 2-3 tbsp Greek Dressing Mix.
